feed.title: The Data Place
feed.subtitle: A better model for data publishing.

entry.title: Launching the Data Place
entry.content: Almost a year ago we created our first data store for Plymouth City Council’s Data Play events. Twelve months later we’re delighted to be launching our initial data store platform for everyone to use.
entry.summary: Almost a year ago we created our first data store for Plymouth City Council’s Data Play events. Twelve months later we’re delighted to be launching our initial data store platform for everyone to use.
